description:
With the survivng ten Beast Knights now united, Yuuhi learns of Nagumo`s past as a detective while Shimaki converses with Animus in his dreams.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amamiya Yuuhi and the Beast Knights (Part 2)
Amamiya Yuuhi to Kemono no Kishidan (Kouhen)
Yûhi Amamiya et les chevaliers animaux (partie 2)
雨宮夕日と獣の騎士団 (後編)
